content:
Prev: Sara at bat Up: Hot Shots vs Green Dragons Next: High fives all around

Clapping chant



At the end of the game, before shaking hands with the other team, the Hot Shots did a long cheer for them at the center of the infield.
Taken Saturday, March 13, 2004, 12:37:12pm.  Original image size: 3072x1728, 6.5Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/800s @ F5.6, ISO 200, 70-200mm/F2.8+1.4x @ 280mm (448mm equiv)
PS7 CRW 5350:5, 0.15:12:50:75:3:25:10+M, Crop
